page.title: 11OVER ALDERLEY SCHOOL
page.content: The old school was built in 1842.It was closed in 1982.It had been open for 140 years.It closed because there were not a lot of children.When the school closed there were 17 pupils There were only 2 full time teachers The Infant room had been added in 1867 The kitchen was added much later The school bell was important.It had to call the chilren back from their lunch on the Edge.The school bell was rung from inside the junior class.The door was very big but it had a little door inside called a wicket door.The school today looks shabby and the play ground has all moss over it.I think it should be made into a news agents.It looks like a library.
